app_descript:
Brief

Plants vs. Zombies Heroes is a strategic card game where players assemble a team, comprising a quirky cast of heroes, and engage in epic duels. The game features characters with unique superpowers and players can create custom decks from an array of plant and zombie cards reminiscent of the classic PvZ series. Navigate through battles on a five-lane board, aiming to minimize damage to your hero as tactics unfold in turn-based combat.
